name: Seven Cities
storyline:
2030, scientists and military set up an IA called PSI, to stop the impending global crisis. New York City, PSI's test city, finds itself at the heart of an increasingly divided conservative America. From this division, the seven districts called Cities are born, each holding a part of the components used to make this AI work. Search these components called CEROMS to relaunch the test program and to revive the hope of the unification of the peoples.

The world didn't wait you to come. Each of the Seven Cities defends its own interests and in this climate of extreme tension, you find yourself propelled in spite of yourself in this travel. As an Outsider, you will have to convince them to join your cause to keep the hope of reuniting New York City.
summary: Seven Cities is an Action-RPG which takes place in an urban contemporary world. A near-future New York full of intrigue. You play as an Outsider along with a robotic companion. Both will evolve through many intensive fights to find the 7 CEROM's.
